# MDMAPR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The MDMAPR application allows for the spatial visualization of run qPCR sample collection locations to reveal species presence/absence patterns. 
## Installation

You can install the released version of MDMAPR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("MDMAPR")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(MDMAPR)
## basic example code
```
